code: import axios from"axios";var BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_BASE_URL;var USERS_API="".concat(BASE_URL,"/api/users");var api=axios.create({withCredentials:true});export var userTogglesTuitLikes=function userTogglesTuitLikes(uid,tid){return api.put("".concat(USERS_API,"/").concat(uid,"/likes/").concat(tid)).then(function(response){return response.data;});};export var findAllTuitsLikedByUser=function findAllTuitsLikedByUser(userId){return api.get("".concat(USERS_API,"/").concat(userId,"/likes")).then(function(response){return response.data;});};
